content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's my pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment quite appealing. So, what price are you thinking of for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 400 Euros per month would be reasonable. It's a great apartment and it's close to everything, but 400 Euros would be ideal for me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but that's far too low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm looking for something closer to 600 Euros per month. What do you think about that?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a big difference, Mister Schmidt. I would be willing to pay 500 Euros per month, but I don't think 600 Euros is reasonable.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but 500 Euros is still not enough for me. I need at least 600 Euros to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. Can you reconsider?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can pay 550 Euros per month. That's the highest I can go, Mister Schmidt.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but 550 Euros is still not enough for me. I need 600 Euros to make this work. If you can't afford that, I'll have to look for another tenant who can.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have reached an impasse on the price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Max. If you change your mind or are willing to increase your offer, please let me know. Good luck in your search for an apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
